citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:38 pm on
05-Dec-17.
Knocked on front door with no answer. Attempted to contact by phone, but phone number no longer belonged to
facility representative. Waited 30 minutes but no one arrived.
